reviews.name: Worx AeroCart, Grey
reviews.reviewText: The multi-functionality of this 'cart' are amazing and will be saving me SO much space. I used to take a wheelbarrow, a dolly and lots of straps for moving bulky items. Remove the handles and this baby fits in the back of my SUV. My trailer is going to feel left out.
reviews.title: All my dreams in one package.

reviews.name: Worx AeroCart, Grey
reviews.reviewText: I like all Worx products and this one I would also like the worx cart I used it the day I got it to move a flower in a huge pot it did a great job . I will get alot of work done this spring. I love all the WORX PRODUCTS/
reviews.title: It can help in so many ways

reviews.name: Worx AeroCart, Grey
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble, very good quality materials used to make, it's sure to last. I would of liked the bin to be bigger, more similar to the size of a regular wheel barrel Other than that, I think it is still better than a traditional wheel barrel.
reviews.title: Aerocart

reviews.name: Worx AeroCart, Grey
reviews.reviewText: i like the cart and all the features but it seems a little to small and short for me. if I fill the bucket level I spill about a quarter of it when I hold the handles and stand with it but I would pay almost twice the price for one double in size
reviews.title: too small

reviews.name: Worx AeroCart, Grey
reviews.reviewText: When my wife heard "Swiss Army knife" of lawn carts, she immediately ordered this for Father's Day. Everything performs as advertised. I added an old topless cooler on the fold down dolly support to hold multiple long garden tools for transport. I built my own seat which doubles as a really low work bench. I find a new use weekly. It's sturdy & well made & I'll trade capacity for ease of use every time. Oh & with a little cleaning, a great party beverage cooler as well as a corn hole dolly.
reviews.title: This cart surprised me
